title: Bann my acc
body: My account was hacking by a hacker can u bann me

replies.body: Please contact the [RIOT Games Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) for further assistance. Also please use the [english boards](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/) next time, otherwise your thread might be deleted.
